summary: The diff does not provide sufficient direct evidence that the hero logo in frontend/src/App.tsx was updated to prevent clipping or that a new transparent/padded logo asset was added under frontend/public/assets/generated. Additionally, there is evidence of changes unrelated to the requested hero-logo-only scope (e.g., Google Maps link standardization and inclusion of an educational section), though it’s unclear whether these were newly introduced or pre-existing due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update ONLY the hero logo rendering in frontend/src/App.tsx so the full logo is always visible (no top/bottom clipping) across mobile/desktop, preserving aspect ratio and avoiding cropping.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided App.tsx diff is truncated before the hero logo markup, so there is no concrete diff evidence showing the sizing/object-fit/overflow changes needed to guarantee no clipping or cropping.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use a transparent-background (or background-matching) logo asset and update the hero logo in frontend/src/App.tsx to reference the updated static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: No new asset file is shown as added under frontend/public/assets/generated (Added: 0), and the truncated App.tsx diff does not show the hero logo src being updated to the specified new transparent/padded asset.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes beyond the hero logo fix, including “consistent use of the exact Google Maps short link across all map interactions”.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly constrained changes to only what is necessary for hero logo visibility/background blending and listed map behavior/links as non-goals. The diff shows MAPS_LINK being defined and referenced in App.tsx and the summary file claims this cross-map standardization.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt: "consistent use of the exact Google Maps short link across all map interactions"

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/maintenance of a “Mobile Care & Smart Usage Guide” section.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest forbids modifying other page sections/content beyond what is required for the hero logo fix and forbids adding new sections. The diff shows an import for MobileCareSmartUsageGuideSection and the summary file states the page includes that educational section.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt: "Mobile Care & Smart Usage Guide section"
